title: The general form
text: If a is a coefficient, $$b$$ is the base of the logarithm, and $$x$$ is the input, the general form of a logarithmic function is $$a\log_{b}{x}$$.

title: Use the Given Point
text: Plug in the given point $$(81,4)$$ into the general form. This gives you the equation $$4=a\log_{b}{81}$$.
